description: Clearwater Financial is a multi service company which elucidates tax preparation as a core service. Clearwater Financial is dedicated to the education of our youth. Much of the profits made through this service is invested in starting non-profit organizations and changing the future of our kids. We offer u0022Very Low Prep Feesu0022 to low income clients and enrolled students. As well, we offer identity theft protection. Prices start from free to $200 and can only do down. Prices are based on client's income, number of exemptions and proof of essential needs, such as rent or vehicle.
name: CLEARWATER FINANCIAL, LLC.
